snippet: Two Connecticut businessmen insisted that they never gave serious consideration to former Governor John G. Rowland’s proposal to become a paid campaign consultant.
abstract: Mark Greenberg, Connecticut businessman and Republican nominee for state's Fifth Congressional District, and business partner Marc Katz testify in corruption trial of former Gov John G Rowland.
lead_paragraph: Two Connecticut businessmen insisted that they never gave serious consideration to former Governor John G. Rowland’s proposal to become a paid campaign consultant.

headline.main: In Testimony, Ex-Governor Is Portrayed as Carrying ‘Baggage’
headline.print_headline: In Testimony, Ex-Governor Is Portrayed as ‘Baggage’
